title: Welcome to 30
body:
Finally hit 30 and about to start chewing through the ranks.

Apparently I can't post in the team recruitment boards yet for some reason so first post is happening here.

replies.body:
I don't recommend it, alot of summoners make the mistake of hitting lvl 30 and just straight jumping into ranked.
Just some things to help, as I cannot stop you.

Make sure you have some rune pages, AD-AP-Tank/Support.
I have 13 which did take me awhile but I'm set for many things.
You got 20 Mastery slots, why not use them all for different things.

Normals are a great way to practice, and people normally feel more confidant in someone when they have a lot of normal wins on their side. Rather then seeing someone with like 50-200 Normal wins.

Master at least 3 roles, even though now you can choose what you get.
And have at least 3 champions for each.

Good Luck Have Fun.

I also recommend playing a bunch of ARAMs to practice team fighting.
On the rift, you (usually) spend very little time per game in actual 5v5 teamfights. ARAM is that all the time.
The skills transfer even though the game mode is very different overall.

Like the others here, i would highly recommend giving ranked a miss for a while.

What Yasei Doubutsu says is 100% true. 

Also when you first start ranked you get put in with low silver MMR, thats where I am now after 4 years of playing, and dragging myself out of bronze 5 (man i must suck) but I not only have AD/AP/Tank/Support runes, I have full champion specific rune pages. 

For champs that are my mains like Aurelion Sol, Azir, Taliyah and Shen, i have rune pages that are exclusively for them, and give just that extra little advantage for that champ. And if you jump into ranked with an unfinished rune page that doesn't really suit your champion, you are putting yourself at a HUGE disadvantage against players like me who have champion tailored rune/mastery pages (and will be in your MMR bracket). 

Do what Yasei recommends, learn 3 champs comfortably for each role, then pick one of those roles and then play those champions to death, then go and buy the counters of those champions and play THOSE champions to death to give you the advantage when vsing them.
